entry.def: A conditioner is a substance which you can put on your hair after you have washed it to make it softer.
A conditioner is a thick liquid which you can use when you wash clothes in order to make them feel softer.

example.ex: Using a fabric conditioner will make clothes easier to handle and iron.
example.tran: 使用织物柔顺剂会使衣服打理、熨烫起来更为容易。

means.word_mean: 3. a substance used in washing (clothing or hair) to make things softer

Sentence.sentence: Solar homes produce the most power on the hot sunny afternoons when everyone rushes home to turn up the air conditioner.
